info.description: This is a sample server celler server.
info.title: Swagger Example API

get.description: This api gets all cars and returns their info

post.description: This api creates a new car and returns its id

get.description: This api gets available cars and returns their info
This api gets a car by its id and returns its info
get.summary: get a car by its id

put.description: This api updates a car by its id and returns its id

delete.description: This api deletes a car by its id and returns error or nil
delete.summary: delete a car by its id

patch.description: This api changes customer password by its login and password and returns message

get.description: This api gets customer cars and returns their info
This api gets a customer by its id and returns its info
get.summary: get a customer by its id

put.description: This api updates a customer by its id and returns its id

delete.description: This api deletes a customer by its id and returns error or nil
delete.summary: delete a customer by its id

get.description: This api gets all orders and returns their info

post.description: This api creates a new order and returns its id

get.description: This api gets a order by its id and returns its info
get.summary: get an order by its id

put.description: This api updates a order by its id and returns its id

delete.description: This api deletes a order by its id
delete.summary: delete an order by its id
